category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Man With Ball, Type-5 emoji is a sequence of the ? Person With Ball, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-5, ? Male Sign and ? Variation S http://emojipedia.org/man-with-ball-type-5/
name: man bouncing ball: medium-dark skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man bouncing a ball emoji showcases a dynamic figure with a medium-dark skin tone in mid-action, his body expertly rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading.  The ball, depicted with soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, appears to be captured in a moment of energetic play, suggesting athleticism and active engagement.  This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying enthusiasm, sports, or a general sense of vibrant activity in digital conversations.
